title: How to Make Kale and Chickpea Soup

steps.headline: Heat the oil in a large saucepan over low heat.
Fry the onion, garlic, sage, salt and pepper.
steps.description: Stir regularly. Keep cooking until the onion and garlic soften; this will take about 5 minutes.

steps.headline: Pour in the stock, 3 cups water, sweet potato, red pepper and chickpeas.
Reduce the heat, cover and simmer until the sweet potatoes become tender.
Add the kale.
steps.description: Simmer until the kale becomes tender, for 5 minutes or so.

text: Heat the oil in a large saucepan over low heat.  Fry the onion, garlic, sage, salt and pepper. Stir regularly. Keep cooking until the onion and garlic soften; this will take about 5 minutes. Pour in the stock, 3 cups water, sweet potato, red pepper and chickpeas. Bring all to the boil. Reduce the heat, cover and simmer until the sweet potatoes become tender. This will take around 15 - 20 minutes. Add the kale. Simmer until the kale becomes tender, for 5 minutes or so. Finished.
